import React from 'react' import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' const DisplayCategories = () => { const params = useParams() const allproducts = useSelector(state => state.products) const dispatch = useDispatch() if(allproducts.loading) return 'Loading...' const category = params.category const products = allproducts.products.filter(product => product.category === category) console.log(products) console.log(category) return (
Image
title

description

) } export default DisplayCategories
